code: import React,{useEffect,useState,useContext}from"react";import{StoreContext}from"../context/StoreContext";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function AllProductsPage(){const[products,setProducts]=useState([]);const{addToCart}=useContext(StoreContext);const categories=["beauty","groceries","furniture"];useEffect(()=>{const fetchAllProducts=async()=>{let allProducts=[];for(let category of categories){const res=await fetch("https://dummyjson.com/products/category/".concat(category));const data=await res.json();allProducts=allProducts.concat(data.products);}setProducts(allProducts);};fetchAllProducts();},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container my-5",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"mb-4",children:"All Products"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"row",children:products.map(product=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"col-sm-6 col-md-4 col-lg-3",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card mb-4 shadow-sm h-100",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:product.thumbnail,className:"card-img-top",alt:product.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card-body d-flex flex-column",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h5",{className:"card-title",children:product.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"card-text",children:["$",product.price]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"btn btn-primary mt-auto",onClick:()=>addToCart(product),children:"Add to Cart"})]})]})},product.id))})]});}
